QuestData.Title: In the Hall of the Mountain-Lord
QuestData.Description: The Thorium Brotherhood doesn't maintain a militia - just a few guards, and me, and that's it. If we're to successfully strike against the Dark Irons of the gorge, we're gonna need help.$b$bMountain-Lord Rendan sits atop that tower across the gorge, to our south. He doesn't consort with Twilight folks or fire elementals, but he hasn't joined the brotherhood either. Maybe it's time we paid him a visit. With his help, we might just stand a chance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Mountain-Lord Rendan at Iron Summit in Searing Gorge.
QuestData.RewardText: And who might you be?$b$bAh, an emissary from the Thorium Brotherhood. They're looking for my support? Fine, I might be willin' to help out...$b$b...for a price.
